EMAIL_NOT_VERIFIED: Account created but email not verified
EMAIL_REQUIRED: We couldn't find an email address associated with your account, please log in with your password or sign up
USERNAME_IS_ALREADY_TAKEN_PLEASE_TRY_ANO: Username is already taken, please try another
YOU_ARE_NOT_ALLOWED_TO_CREATE_A_NEW_ORGA: You are not allowed to create a new organization
PASSWORD_TOO_SHORT: Password too short, must be at least 6 characters
PASSWORD_TOO_LONG: Password too long, must be at most 128 characters
CODE_EXPIRED: Code expired, please request a new one
INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR: Internal server error, please try again later
FORBIDDEN: Access denied, you do not have permission to perform this action
TOO_MANY_REQUESTS: Too many requests, please try again later
SERVICE_UNAVAILABLE: Service unavailable, please try again later
BAD_REQUEST: Bad request, please check the data sent
METHOD_NOT_ALLOWED: Method not allowed, please check API documentation
PAYLOAD_TOO_LARGE: Payload too large, reduce the size of the data sent
RATE_LIMIT_EXCEEDED: Rate limit exceeded, please wait before trying again
YOU_CANNOT_LEAVE_THE_ORGANIZATION_AS_THE: You cannot leave the organization as the only owner
USER_IS_NOT_A_MEMBER_OF_THE_ORGANIZATION: User is not a member of the organization
